divs: Sighting DetailsFriday evening I went out on the back deck to smoke a cigarette and look at the moom. i noticed a jet going west to east then I noticed a light moving above it going nne. i thought it might be a sattalite. then I seen another than another then more. I called in the house for a friend to come look by then I seen more and pointed them out. he called. a roommate out to see and she freaked out. and went back in. the clouds started to move in but by then I counted 15 for sure but I know there had to be more. there was no formation they were scattered across the eastern half of the sky here and there a few overhead some far nne some. comming into view from the south. as far as how high I couldn't say . they were very high way way higher then the plane I saw. they were all going nne. I've seen lights before but never more than one. i just was in awe wondering what and where they were going. I'm just glad I had a couple people to witness these as well.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Minot
There were no other sightings in Minot on or around October 18th 2013
